channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- RMC-100 (Standard)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- RMC-100 (Standard)

item.title: CVE-2022-0902|2024-09-17T02:00:38.883Z -- abb -- rmc-100%20%28standard%29
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal'), Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in flow computer and remote controller products of ABB ( RMC-100 (Standard), RMC-100-LITE, XIO, XFCG5 , XRCG5 , uFLOG5 , UDC) allows an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could insert and run arbitrary code in an affected system node.
